article.title: Build a JWT Authenticated API with Lumen(v5.8)
article.description: In this tutorial, we will be using lumen; a super-fast micro-framework by laravel to build a simple and secure REST API. At the end of this tutorial, you should be able to build production-ready APIs. Let's get started!

article.title: Deploying Laravel on shared Hosting
article.description: If you are here, you are probably exploring how laravel works on shared hosting, on some low-budget project or just have reasons you prefer shared hosting. Alright, let's get down to business.

article.title: Introduction to OOP in Javascript
article.description: We covered class definition, properties, methods and inheritance.
